RelativeTemporalAnnotation.TEXT: Admission Date : 2017-08-12 Discharge Date : 2017-08-16 Service : SURGERY Allergies : History of Present Illness : 22 year old female transfer from outside hospital after a motor vehicle accident with diagnosed liver laceration by CT scan . Brief Hospital Course : Patient was admited , pain was managed with a PCA and later with PO medication . The liver laceration was stable , no sign of rupture or further complication , did not required surgical managment . The liver enzimes come down , no signs of biliary stasis . She was able to tolerate diet , ambulate , having a bowel movement and dischargo home in good conditions .
